publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3189 Stewart Stevenson: Police Attendance at Incidents of Drugs Overdosingâ€”That the Parliament notes with concern the intention that police no longer attend reported incidents of drug overdoses; believes that police can provide direct assistance in the often difficult circumstances surrounding such incidents; understands that lives have been saved through police attendance, and calls for reinstatement of previous policy and practice.
S2M-3189 Police Attendance at Incidents of Drugs Overdosing (lodged on 26 August 2005) Mr Adam Ingram*, Michael Matheson*, Christine Grahame*
